channel.title: Player vs player (delta)
channel.description:
hey guyz, does any1 know wat is the method when u get killed by a player in wild?
what im trying to do is make teleblock == fale when i die from player... in wild
i'ev seen some of the methods
this is one of them
[code]if (deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500 && isInPitGame() && !IsInFightCave())[/code]
but this is in fightcave :S
so does any1 know wildness method?
so when a player is teleblocked and killed by me his his teleblock goes away when he dies "but only in wild"
thanks:)

item.title: Player vs player (delta)
item.dc:creator: @n0_limit_k0 n0_limit_k0
item.description:
@n0_limit_k0 wrote:

hey guyz, does any1 know wat is the method when u get killed by a player in wild?

what im trying to do is make teleblock == fale when i die from player… in wild

i’ev seen some of the methods

this is one of them

if (deathStage == 2 && System.currentTimeMillis() - deathTimer >= 2500 && isInPitGame() && !IsInFightCave())

but this is in fightcave :S

so does any1 know wildness method?

so when a player is teleblocked and killed by me his his teleblock goes away when he dies “but only in wild”

thanks:)
